price: 93. Di (¡oh, Muhammad!): “¡Señor!, si haces que presencie el castigo que has prometido (a quienes niegan la verdad),
arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yūʿadūna
